job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: Job Title: Software Engineer 5Location: Mountain View, CA (100% Remote is an option for this role as long as the candidate can work PST time zone)Role: Full TimeJob ResponsibilitiesRequirements:â¢ 6+ years of professional experience as a Sr. Software Engineerâ¢ 4+ years of solid experience in Ruby on Rails with experience in libraries like Resque and RSpecâ¢ Experience with GrapQL is a big plusâ¢ Experience in ReactJS/Redux JavaScript frameworks, Ad experience a plusâ¢ Experience in JavaScript, HTML5, CSS3, and other core web technologiesâ¢ Experience in consuming REST APIs in JavaScript/NodeJSâ¢ Experience in SCM Source Code Management systems and tools, such as GITâ¢ Strong knowledge in Computer Science foundationsâ¢ BS/MS in Computer Science/Engineering or equivalent experience
